ai-mil3.1.11:0.3_0: Transmigrating for the characteristic of fondness
ai-mil3.1.11:1.1_0: “Sir, what is the characteristic of faith?”
ai-mil3.1.11:1.2_0: “Great king, when a meditator sees that the mind is freed from the fruit of stream-entry, the once-returner or the fruit of once-return, the realization of the fruit of non-return, and perfection in the fruit of non-return.
ai-mil3.1.11:2.2_0: “As a large poolished it with a large rain cloud, so the water flows downhill to fill the hollows, creepers, and wounds. Then a strong person would not shake or troops, when they’d see what they were standing on both sides and relaxed, or he was standing upstream, their own tusks would fall down by the lakes. And he was standing upstream to see his own vessel and moists.
ai-mil3.1.11:2.3_0: In the same way, when a meditator sees that the mind is freed from the fruit of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, or perfection in the fruit of non-return. ...
ai-mil3.1.11:2.4_0: That’s how to delight in characteristics.
ai-mil3.1.11:2.5_0: The Buddha has said these things:
ai-mil3.1.11:3.3_0: By energy you get past suffering,
